name: Fire Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to cast fiery spells
looks: The Fire Staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings and a cylindrical crystal embedded at the top. The crystal glows with a fiery orange light, and flames dance along the staff when it is invoked.

special_weapon_skils.fire_magic: Increases damage and effectiveness of fire spells

special_effects.fire_immunity: Grants immunity to fire damage while equipped

name: Crimson Blade
description: A deadly sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The Crimson Blade is a longsword with a curved blade that is forged from a unique red metal. The hilt is wrapped in dark leather, and the pommel is adorned with a ruby gemstone.

special_weapon_skils.fire_sword: Grants a bonus to Fire Sword skill.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good head protection.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made from durable steel plates.
looks: The Steel Chestplate is a strong and sturdy piece of armor that covers the entire torso. It is made from thick steel plates that are riveted together, providing excellent protection.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy-duty gauntlets made from steel to provide maximum protection for the hands.
looks: The gauntlets are made of thick steel plates with reinforced joints. They have a layered design that covers the entire hand and extends up to the forearm. There are leather straps and metal buckles for secure fastening.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel.
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel and have a slightly curved shape to protect the wearer's hands and fingers. They have small openings for the fingers and adjustable straps to secure them in place.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy steel sword
looks: The steel sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a polished silver finish. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and has a simple crossguard.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel
looks: The shield is made of polished steel, with a rounded shape and a handle on the back for gripping.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the incantation for the Fireball spell. When read, it allows the user to cast a powerful fireball projectile.
looks: The scroll is made from aged parchment and is sealed with a red wax seal. The incantation for the Fireball spell is written in elegant script.

special_effects.spell_fireball: Allows the user to cast the Fireball spell.

name: Golden Ring
description: A beautiful ring made of pure gold.
looks: The golden ring is adorned with intricate designs and has a polished golden surface that shines brightly.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a slender and elegant design, with a silver blade that gleams in the light. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Silver Longsword
description: A well-crafted longsword made from silver, imbued with magical energy.
looks: The silver longsword has a shining blade with intricate engravings that glow faintly. The handle is made of polished silver and wrapped with black leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

special_effects.silver_effect: Deals extra damage to creatures vulnerable to silver.

name: Enchanted Silver Sword
description: A beautiful silver sword imbued with powerful enchantments
looks: The enchanted silver sword has a gleaming silver blade that reflects light. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings and a gemstone inlay.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy with swords
special_weapon_skills.magic_strike: Enables the use of magic-infused strikes

name: Adamantine Greataxe
description: A massive greataxe made from adamantine, known for its incredible strength and durability.
looks: The Adamantine Greataxe is a large, two-handed weapon with a long handle made of blackened steel. The axe head is made from shimmering adamantine, with razor-sharp edges and a spiked pommel at the end.

special_weapon_skils.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe Mastery skill.

special_effects.armor_piercing: Has a chance to ignore a percentage of the target's armor.

name: Iron Greaves
description: Sturdy iron greaves that protect the lower legs.
looks: The iron greaves are made of solid iron plates, covering the front and sides of the lower legs. They are secured with leather straps and buckles.
